reviewText: I really like this movie! it shows a lot of sign language and helps me learn more signs for my career!

I really like this movie, and what a great price on Amazon!!! Good suspense and a great twist at the end that I didn't see coming! I love Marlee Matlin, and she does a great job in this movie (as usual!) Definitely one that many have seen but should definitely check out!
The movie was alright, not the most interesting story she has presented but it was based on a true story.
I GOT THIS DVD BECAUSE I'M A MARLEE MATLIN FAN. I'M ALSO HEARING IMPAIRED AND KNOW SIGN LANGUAGE.MY FRIEND AND I HAD A CHANCE TO MEET HER IN PERSON LAST YEAR AND DID.THE MOVIE IS A GOOD SUSPENSE FILM
Even if you don't sign or sign a little or are fluent, see it! What you don't know, you will learn & see what has been going on and, surprise surprise!

This movie is entertaining enough to hold your interest.  I purchased it to show my students who are deaf, but to my dismay- there is no closed captioning!  This is unacceptable!  They make a movie with an actress who is deaf and then they don't caption the DVD for other individuals who are deaf to be able to access the content?!  I was very disappointed- and very tired-  after I had to interpret the entire film for my class.  I hope the "powers that be" will remedy this soon.

Take a murder and throw in deafness, old flames, jealousy, maintaining a perfect trial record---and you've got a good movie.  That this movie does.
A deaf witness, a jealous, ambitious wife of son of Senatorial candidate, potential funds comingling, old romance between Prosecutor and Defense Attornies-- makes one think all the time at potential subplots and outcomes.
For sure I was into the wife of Russ doing the murder, but knew that was too obvious---it had to be someone else.  Won't begin to give that away for those who haven't yet seen.  Ending was surprise that took me off guard.
Acting was good all around.  Martin is excellent.

I saw this movie on Lifetime TV and I would have never guessed that the ending would have been so unexpected.  I can't wait for this movie to come out on video.  All I have to say is that you need to watch this movie.  Marlee Matlin is as convincing as can be.  This movie will keep you on the edge of your seat.  Regina King, who you may have seen in "Jerry Maguire" as Cuba Gooding Jr.'s wife, is fantastic in this movie as a lawyer.  She is one to watch!
This movie was actually better than what I had expected.  It is a murder mystery.  The acting is very good and the plot is filled with suspension.
Was hoping for more visual signing through the movie.
This movie was just as good and suspenseful as it were when I watched it years ago. I love both Marlee Matlin and Regina King and they both did an awesome job acting to make this a great movie.
this is not a bad movie but just not great good plot twist at the end.buy if you like marlee matlin

I actually love this movie, since it shows a Deaf woman being very smart and savvy.  However, because it is not closed-captioned, I only give it one star.  I was very disappointed when I received my copy of the DVD to find that there were no captions...which means I can't show it to my Deaf students, or understand it myself (I first saw it on TV with captions).
DVD does not have closed caption for hearing impaired, but it is okay for me to have it. I let other who are hearing, watch my DVD movie.
Really good she is really act good show I watch about deaf I love it and try that show real good show
